content.2: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
content.3: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah:
content.4: And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah
content.5: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
content.6: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
content.7: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
content.8: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
content.9: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
content.10: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
content.11: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
content.12: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
content.13: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
content.14: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
content.15: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
content.17: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa
content.18: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat
content.19: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
content.20: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
content.21: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he
content.22: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
content.23: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof,
content.24: And after that Hezron was dead in Caleb-ephratah, then Abiah Hezron’s wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
content.25: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem,
content.26: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name
content.27: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
content.28: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
content.29: And the name of the wife of Abishur
content.30: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
content.31: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
content.32: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
content.33: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
content.34: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name
content.35: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
content.36: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
content.37: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
content.38: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
content.39: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
content.40: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
content.41: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
content.42: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel
content.43: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
content.44: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
content.46: And Ephah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
content.47: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
content.48: Maachah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
content.49: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb
content.50: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath-jearim,
content.51: Salma the father of Beth-lehem, Hareph the father of Beth-gader.
content.52: And Shobal the father of Kirjath-jearim had sons; Haroeh,
content.53: And the families of Kirjath-jearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.
content.54: The sons of Salma; Beth-lehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
content.55: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites,
